questionText: The 1980s: What popular candy was originally slated to be the favorite of E.T. in the film E.T., but the company didn’t want the candy associated with an alien?
The 1990s:  Which musical artist tore up a picture of Pope John Paul II during a live taping of Saturday Night Live?
The 2000s: Who let the dogs out?
The 1980s: Which of the following is NOT a rule about Gremlins from the 1984 film?

availableAnswers.A: Never let them out during the day.
availableAnswers.C: Never let them eat after midnight.

questionText: The 1990s: Which two actors played opposite one another in the movie Point Break.

availableAnswers.B: Harrison Ford and Jean Claude Van Damme

questionText: The 2000s: What failed sports league started in 2001?
